ms4ndRd2F9MDa6w7w.name: Easy to hit
ms4ndRd2F9MDa6w7w.notes: Others can target your eyes at -6

m8LVG3CHHMfhVf4pf.name: Directional
m8LVG3CHHMfhVf4pf.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

mpxGPFX5IjVHsZ8mf.name: Tough Skin
mpxGPFX5IjVHsZ8mf.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

m485y2Tny7WQgIbHk.name: Partial (@Location, 1 level per -1 Per Hit Modifier, Torso is -10% thus level 1@)

t8-AsjCyUEPZgWQPm.name: Flexibility (Double-Jointed)
t8-AsjCyUEPZgWQPm.notes: May ignore up to -5 in penalties for close quarters

magcF-5jwlCBOCzwq.name: Diffuse
magcF-5jwlCBOCzwq.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

mYQBVSdKyl7mOgvpM.name: Homogenous
mYQBVSdKyl7mOgvpM.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

mkuFDgjESN2WVLTex.name: No Blood
mkuFDgjESN2WVLTex.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

mnVAsbR45O1ROED3z.name: No Brain
mnVAsbR45O1ROED3z.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

mOAKYYmSwne7r61ff.name: No Eyes
mOAKYYmSwne7r61ff.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

mGdDgMowEpU2U4sTx.name: No Head
mGdDgMowEpU2U4sTx.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

mVbIG8tuojUvAw5F2.name: No Neck
mVbIG8tuojUvAw5F2.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

m4dcFb3G2NQh8bGsO.name: No Vitals
m4dcFb3G2NQh8bGsO.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

mSmsYPqDr2I6lYyuX.name: Unliving
mSmsYPqDr2I6lYyuX.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

tC4ID4H82Mjc8hMUP.name: Resistant to Disease
tC4ID4H82Mjc8hMUP.notes: Given the deficiencies of their primitive physiology, Hiver medicine excels at improving their resistance to various infections and internal disfunctions. Most Hivers enjoy two levels of this advantage, but its benefits are halved (to +4) because of their Weak Immune System disadvantage, described under Disadvantages. Rare Hivers from lower-TL backgrounds might not enjoy this benefit.

mol4-AhzN60Tvjzxx.name: @Rare: Acceleration, Altitude Sickness, Bends, Seasickness, Space Sickness, Nanomachines, etc.@

mMbcu47EjKGHgddG-.name: +8 to all HT rolls to resist

msfBqq1HbXQaqq9q1.name: +3 to all HT rolls to resist

tEIOarTilSJ9LrhrB.name: Susceptible (disease - nervous, lymph nodes, tissue, brain)
tEIOarTilSJ9LrhrB.notes: While the Hiver"s relatively crude physiology confers manybenelits (primary among them their Regrowth advanttage), it also creates problcms. Foremost among these are frequent breakdowns in their endocrine system.

tkFEoU3t52t9wr4T_.name: Callous
tkFEoU3t52t9wr4T_.notes: +1 to Interrogation and Intimidation rolls when you use threats or torture

features.situation: from past victims and anyone with Empathy

tRK2BhJOIDerCgZ1n.name: Combat Paralysis
tRK2BhJOIDerCgZ1n.notes: In any situation in which personal harm seems imminent, make a HT roll. Do not roll until the instant you need to fight, run, pull the trigger, or whatever. Any roll over 13 is a failure, even if you have HT 14+. On a success, you can act normally. On a failure, you are mentally stunned.

tRvQ_LSzO7I02f4Fy.name: Cowardice
tRvQ_LSzO7I02f4Fy.notes: Make a self-control roll any time you are called on to risk physical danger. Roll at -5 if you must risk death.

td78QZ9-xVBi_kP5I.name: Curious
td78QZ9-xVBi_kP5I.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with an interesting item or situation

t_m5SSFlAKZLI0zhO.name: Low Pain Threshold
t_m5SSFlAKZLI0zhO.notes: Double the shock from any injury. You roll at -4 to resist knockdown, stunning, and physical torture. Whenever you take a wound that does more than 1 HP of damage, you must make a Will roll to avoid crying out.

features.situation: from others in any situation where No Sense of Humor becomes evident

tPrh07_wvQ3TtLwky.name: Post-Combat Shakes
tPrh07_wvQ3TtLwky.notes: Make a self-control roll at the end of any battle. If you fail, roll 3d, add the amount by which you failed your self-control roll, and look up the result on the Fright Check Table.

features.situation: from individuals sensitive to criticism or insults that you interact with

tKHFtHFSr6gyPP7aT.name: Virus magnet -- roll HT+2 every month or come down with an annoying but treatable illness

tcnAHxopoBTb2odnJ.name: Selfish (Hivers as a race are selfish, though less so as individuals)
tcnAHxopoBTb2odnJ.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you experience a clear social slight or “snub.” On a failure, you lash out at the offending party.

features.situation: from others when your Selfishness surfaces

meaWhH9yx41uGdnFj.name: Limited (Vs. Psionic Vampirism and Telepathy only)
